dcterms:description: A dataset of handwritten digits consisting of 70,000 binary images of size 28x28, commonly used for training various image processing systems.
dcterms:title: MNIST

dcterms:description: An object recognition dataset containing 60,000 color images, each of size 32x32, categorized into 10 different classes.
dcterms:title: CIFAR-10

dcterms:description: A dataset that includes images of objects belonging to 101 categories, with approximately 40 to 800 images per category, totaling around 5,000 images.
